name: The Escape from Bungalow
description:
This is a horror escape game。
When you wake up, you will find yourself locked in an unknown closed dark room. Why are you here? Find the "key" and escape from the room. But you should pay attention that the owner of the house is staring at you at any time, and will be killed if you do not pay attention.

The content contained in this game may not be suitable for all ages, or it is not suitable to access during work: frequent violence or blood, common adult content
